rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. Put a charge counter on Grim Marshwood.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Grim Marshwood has 5 or more charge counters on it, until end of turn it becomes an X/X Horror creature with indestructible and vigilance, where X is the number of counters on it.
